text:
Johanna (Hannie) van Leeuwen (18 January 1926 – 1 August 2018) was a Dutch politician of the Anti Revolutionary Party (until 1980) and the Christian Democratic Appeal. She was born in Delft, Netherlands. van Leeuwen was Senator from 1995 to 2007.
van Leeuwen died in Rotterdam on 1 August 2018, aged 92.
